short_summary: Repair and upgrading cableway at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek
description: This procurement is for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) to obtain a contractor to conduct construction activities to upgrade the existing cableway at the Water Survey of Canada Station at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek.",
full_summary:
Cableway Upgrades and Repairs at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek
==============================================

**Tender Details**

*   **Title:**
    *   English: Cableway Upgrades and Repairs at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek (08EE020)
    *   French: Améliorations et réparations du téléphérique à Rivière Telkwa en aval du Ruisseau Tsai (08EE020)
*   **Reference Number:**
    *   PW-22-01005667
*   **Amendment Number:**
    *   1
*   **Solicitation Number:**
    *   5000064501
*   **Publication Date:**
    *   2022-08-30
*   **Tender Closing Date:**
    *   2022-09-12T17:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:**
    *   2022-09-02
*   **Tender Status:**
    *   Expired (English)
    *   Expiré (French)
*   **GSIN(NIBS)**
    *   5139A - Construction Services, Not Elsewhere Specified
    *   5159B - Other Special Trade Construction Work
*   **Government Tender Category:**
    *   CNST

**Background and Objective**

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the upgrade and repair of a cableway at the Water Survey of Canada Station at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek. The existing cableway has degraded over time, posing safety concerns for personnel operations. The required upgrades will ensure the structure meets acceptable safety standards.

**Contract Scope**

The contract scope includes:

*   Upgrading the cableway to a level of safety acceptable for personnel operation.
*   Conducting construction activities to repair and upgrade the existing structure.

**Additional Information**

*   The anticipated period of the contract is from contract award to October 16, 2022.
*   The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   Interested suppliers should contact Garvin Suepaul at garvin.suepaul@ec.gc.ca for additional information.

**Attachments**

The following documents are attached:

*   Invitation to Tender - Amendment 001 Q&A (English)
*   Invitation to Tender - 5000064501 - Telkwa River (English)
*   Annex B -
